backend/main.mo: Defines messaging backend with users, conversations, calls, friendships, and integrated access control and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files used elsewhere in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions establishing light and dark OKLCH color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling onboarding, identity setup, backend registration, and rendering ChatShell within QueryClient and CallProvider.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports app name and tagline constants.
frontend/src/constants/buildInfo.ts: Provides build identifier derived from environment variable or document timestamp.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Deprecated login screen displaying branding and a message that it is no longer used.
frontend/src/features/auth/NameStartView: Name entry onboarding view saving display name locally and notifying parent to proceed.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallChip.tsx: Displays a minimized call widget showing peer info and controls for mute and hang up. Uses CallProvider state to restore or end the active call.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallProvider: Manages global call state including active session, mute status, and minimize/restore actions. Exposes hooks and context methods to start, end, and control calls.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallScreen.t: Renders the full call UI with video, error, and loading states. Integrates local media streams and provides controls to mute, minimize, or end the call.
frontend/src/features/calls/useLocalMedi: Handles acquiring, managing, and cleaning up local audio/video media streams with error normalization. Provides utilities to enable/disable audio and clean up tracks.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatShell.tsx: Defines the main chat layout containing the conversation list and message thread. Manages conversation selection and opening the new chat dialog.
frontend/src/features/chat/ConversationL: Lists user conversations with unread indicators and deletion support. Loads conversations and user data, rendering selectable conversation items.
frontend/src/features/chat/FriendRequest: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageCompos: Message composer UI for sending text and optional images with validation, preview, and upload progress.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageThread: Displays a conversation thread, loads messages with polling, marks them read, and shows the composer.
frontend/src/features/chat/NewChatDialog: Dialog for searching users and starting new conversations with error handling.
frontend/src/features/chat/time.ts: Utility functions for formatting timestamps into relative or time-of-day strings.
frontend/src/features/chat/useMessagePol: Hook that periodically invalidates queries to refresh messages and conversation metadata.
frontend/src/features/profile/AppInfoHel: Dialog showing app URL, copy/reload tools, and cache‑refresh instructions.
frontend/src/features/profile/ChangeDisp: Dialog for updating the user’s display name using a mutation and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/features/profile/DisplayNam: UI dialog for entering and saving a display name, registering via local actor and completing onboarding.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileMen: Profile dropdown showing user info with options to change name and view app help dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor using a locally generated identity and sets up access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for conversations, messages, users, and mutations like sending messages or starting conversations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining light/dark themes, variables, and message bubble styles.
frontend/src/lib/localIdentity.ts: Utility functions to generate, store, load, and clear locally persisted Ed25519 identities.
frontend/src/lib/localProfile.ts: Provides helpers to store, retrieve, and clear display name and onboarding state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and including plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON tracking project metadata, features, issues, and requirements for ongoing work.
